pages.text: Pipes will automatically connect to anything they can connect to. A centrifugal pump is the only factor that provides displacement and the direction of the displacement.$(br2)The pipe wrench is used to break or re-connect pipe connections, preventing undesired flow paths and therefore different lines to be placed next to each other.$(br)Right click with the wrench on the side of the pipe you wish to (dis/re)connect.
